body.p:
State of Kentucky
Henry Franklin County } sct --

This day personally appeared before me, the undersigned Justice of the peace in & for the County & State aforesaid F H Goodrich and made oath that on the 1st day of December 1862, in the County of Henry & State of Kentucky, one W D Mitchell did did with malice aforethought, & without excuse or justification shoot & kill one Flet Goodrich Jr.. And that said Mitchell was arrested & tried for said crime before the County Judge of said County & was by said Judge Committed to the jail of said County to await his ^final^ trial for Said Killing & that on the night of the 9th day of Dec 1862 -- said Mitchell escaped from said jail & has fled (as affiant is informed) to the state of Indiana --
Sworn to in due form before the undersigned a Justice of the peace for Franklin County this 13th day of January 1863
